rule.name: Average degree student
rule.author: Jonas Scheurich
rule.description: "Executes" the spreadsheet and checks for several possible conditions.
rule.background: A testscenario which is built by userdefined conditions. While the process of checking the spreadsheet is executed, that is formulae of the spreadsheet are evaluated.
rule.solution: Check the formulae in the causing cell or region.

singleviolation.description: The found value was not in the interval ]4475.0;4525.0[

rule.name: Formula Complexity
rule.author: Sebastian Zitzelsberger
rule.description: Checks whether formula complexity goes beyond a certain nesting level or contains more than a certain number of operations

singleviolation.description: Number of operations [12] exceeds maximum allowed number of operations [5] and nesting level [4] exceeds maximum allowed nesting level [2]
Nesting level [3] exceeds maximum allowed nesting level [2]
Number of operations [7] exceeds maximum allowed number of operations [5] and nesting level [5] exceeds maximum allowed nesting level [2]

rule.name: No Constants In Formulas
rule.author: Sebastian Zitzelsberger
rule.description: Checks whether formulas contain constant values.
rule.background: Constant values are not alyways as constant as they seem in the beginning. In case their values change, its hard to adjust the constants consistently in the spreadsheet if they are not located in individual cells.
rule.solution: Extract the constants into to separate cells and reference these cells

singleviolation.description: The following constants were found: Numeric, Numeric, Integer (2x), Numeric, Integer, Integer, Integer, Numeric
The following constants were found: Integer
The following constants were found: Integer
The following constants were found: Integer (2x)
The following constants were found: Integer, Integer (2x), Numeric, Integer

rule.name: Plausibility checks
rule.author: N.A.
rule.description: Checks whether the to be checked values are conform with the given plausible combinations are.
rule.solution: Correcting obvious typing mistakes, consult the explanation or additional research is required.

rule.name: Reading direction - References
rule.author: Sebastian Zitzelsberger
rule.description: Checks whether the spreadsheet can be read in configurable directions.

rule.name: Well degree student
rule.author: Jonas Scheurich
rule.description: "Executes" the spreadsheet and checks for several possible conditions.
rule.background: A testscenario which is built by userdefined conditions. While the process of checking the spreadsheet is executed, that is formulae of the spreadsheet are evaluated.
rule.solution: Check the formulae in the causing cell or region.

singleviolation.description: The found value was not in the interval ]4800.0;4820.0[
